description: Experimental set up as ssp370SST except sea surface temperatures (SST) and sea ice concentrations (SICONC) are from a 2005-2014 climatology. Diagnostics are as ssp370SST
long_name: SSP3-7.0, with SSTs prescribed as present day

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

requirements.description: Present day sea surface temperature (SST) calculated from a 2005-2014 climatology of the model's own CMIP6 historical simulation.
requirements.label: Present Day 2005-2014 SST Climatology

requirements.description: Present day sea ice concentration (SIC) calculated from a 2005-2014 climatology of the model's own CMIP6 historical simulation.
requirements.label: Present Day 2005-2014 SIC Climatology

requirements.description: Impose changing concentrations of RCP7.0 tropospheric ozone precursors.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, tropospheric ozone precursors
requirements.label: RCP70 Tropospheric Ozone Precursors

requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0
requirements.label: RCP70 Forcing

requirements.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes future solar forcing (2015-2299).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
requirements.keywords: Solar Forcing, Future, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
requirements.label: Future Solar Irradiance Forcing

requirements.description: Future solar particle forcing (2015-2299). For models with interactive stratospheric chemistry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair production by galactic cosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
requirements.keywords: Solar forcing, Future, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
requirements.label: Future Solar Particle Forcing

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
